sentences.en: He emerged victorious in the elections.
sentences.cn: 他在竞选中脱颖而出获得胜利。

sentences.en: The city turned out to welcome the victorious team home.
sentences.cn: 全市居民倾城而出欢迎凯旋归来的队伍。

sentences.en: The victorious team will parade through the city tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 明天上午获胜队将在城内举行庆祝游行。
